Name: Negroni Tredici
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Cynar or other carciofo amaro
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist and orange wedge.
Express lemon zest twist over the cocktail and discard.
Review: A amaro riff on the Negroni.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2009 by Toby Maloney of Alchemy Consulting, USA. Negroni cocktail history and recipe variations
Nutrition: One serving of Negroni Tredici contains 208 calories
